timeline.bodyText: We're in general NOT good about treating PASS and unfiltered differently.  I'm pretty sure htsjdk conflates the two as "not filtered"
timeline.author: lbergelson

replies.bodyText: Well, it seems we do track it.  nevermind.
replies.author: lbergelson

timeline.bodyText: I think this would be a better test if it ran twice both INVALIDATE_PREVIOUS_FILTERS_LONG_NAME = true and false.
timeline.author: lbergelson

timeline.message: Guess what -- invalidating filters didn't work and there were no tests
